channel.title: Geting server online
channel.description: ive downloaded a source and want it online, i have had the server running on localhost. i downloaded no-ip and set up a host there, then i forwarded the port and checked it with a port forward checker and it was open. i changed the ip address in the files to the computers one (the one that no-ip chose not 192.168....) then i kina got stuck there, i downloaded hamachi on both computers and connected them but the client keeps saying "...scape is offline, try again later" ive also tryed it on moparscape but it cant connect at all (if its sposed to)

item.title: Geting server online
item.dc:creator: @soda_chip soda chip
item.description:
@soda_chip wrote:

[quote=“nicke924, post:4, topic:382597”][quote author=soda chip link=topic=478391.msg3501531#msg3501531 date=1297771617]

Utorret

ah ok so ive forwarded my port on that now how do i get the other computer to connect ?
[/quote]
Change ip in client GUI.Java or EGUI.java or client.java[/quote]

forgot to mention that i have done all ready, when i try to open the source in moparscape (downloaded with my ip address in it) unederneath it says “couldnt open output stream to log file (username).20110215.log” if that helps

Read full topic

item.title: Geting server online
item.dc:creator: @nicke924 nicke924
item.description:
@nicke924 wrote:

[quote=“soda chip, post:3, topic:382597”][quote author=runewings317 link=topic=478391.msg3501527#msg3501527 date=1297771403]
Utorret
[/quote]
ah ok so ive forwarded my port on that now how do i get the other computer to connect ?[/quote]
Change ip in client GUI.Java or EGUI.java or client.java
